Taste of Russia

Video Demo

Final project for Flatiron- Russian recipe app. Search, create your own or delete recipes

Video Demo

Collaborated on creating a Travel app. Browse destinations and save them to your profile with desired travel dates

Vino Map

Live Demo

Vino Map-an interactive map of the best wineries in the US, 3rd place winner of Mintbean's solo hackathon. Created in under 4 hours.

  • Utilized Mapbox - JavaScript library for creating interactive, customizable vector maps on the web
  • Created a fully customized map and integrated it into the application
  • Developed a custom geoJSON for rendering geospatial data
  • Implemented custom pins and pop-up windows with information about each winery
